content: bookmark birds a claire g a r l a n d knitting pattern finished size approx 16cm length from tail to beak 61/2cm tall yarn knitted - 12 metres sport weight yarn - i used 1/2 x 25gm ball scheepjes catona needles 3 5mm/ size 4 knitting needles gauge knitted - 12 stitches 21 row of garter stitch over 5cm with 3 5mm needles extras scraps toy filling or scraps fabric/ yarn for stuffing lengths ribbon or braid pattern beginning with the tail cast on 8sts row 1 - 22 garter stitch 22 row row 23 decrease k3 skpo k3 - 7sts row 24 k row 25 increase kfb k to last st kfb - 9sts row 26 - 39 increase repeat last 2 row 7 times - 23sts row 40 - 46 garter stitch 7 row row 47 decrease skpo k9 kfb k9 k2 decrease - 22sts row 48 k4 place marker pm - for wings if required - k4 pm k6 pm k4 pm k to end row 49 skpo k7 kfb k2 kfb k7 k2 decrease row 50 k row 51 - 52 repeat last 2 row once row 53 decrease skpo k to last 2 sts k2 decrease - 20sts row 54 skpo k6 kfb k2 kfb k6 k2 decrease row 55 decrease skpo k to last 2 sts k2 decrease - 18sts row 56 decrease skpo k to last 2 sts k2 decrease - 16sts row 57 decrease skpo k to last 2 sts k2 decrease - 14sts page 2 page 3 short row to shape the head wings - if you want pretty wings short row 1 k11 bring yarn to the front of the work slip next st purl-wise rs facing with bird s head facing towards you pick up 4 sts between markers onto the right hand needle take working yarn to the back slip the slipped stitch row 1 increase kfb k to last st kfb - 6sts back onto the left hand needle turn the knitting take working yarn to the back row 2 k ready for knitting = w+t wrap and turn then after you ve turned you knit row 3 increase kfb k to last st kfb - 8sts back along the stitches you ve just knitted row 4- 5 garter stitch 2 row short row 2 k8 w+t row 6 decrease skpo k to last 2 sts k2 decrease - 6sts short row 3 k7 w+t row 7 k short row 4 k6 w+t row 8 decrease skpo k to last 2 sts k2 decrease - 4sts short row 5 k5 w+t row 9 skpo k2 decrease - 2 sts short row 6 k4 w+t row 10 k2 decrease fasten_off use the tail end to sew the wing tip to the body short row 7 k3 w+t short row 8 k2 w+t to make up short row 9 k1 w+t fold the bird in half matching row ends end short row k7sts to end beginning at the
